    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="17322" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="17322" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.80</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2130">2,130</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="300"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme</b> by <b>Gucci</b> is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. <b>Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme</b> was launched in 2013. Top notes are Lavender and Green Coriander; middle notes are Green Notes, Orange Blossom and Neroli; base notes are Cedar and Patchouli. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Gucci Guilty and Gucci Guilty Intense have been heralded as the scents of 21st Century seduction. In these audacious, globally award-winning perfumes, today’s guiltless young men and women have discovered the scent of provocation that has proved utterly addictive. Thrill seekers the world over have been seduced into indulging in guilty pleasures. Now, in the dark and mysterious Gucci Guilty Black, the story becomes still more compelling, giving it a new, more passionate and more daring edge. A sequel and a new chapter.</p>

<p>Creative Director Frida Giannini remarks: “These characters fascinate us as they are taken on a life of their own. We are eager to know about the next chapter in their story as it unfolds through Guilty Black”. The Guilty Black lovers bring out the most thrilling sides of each other: alone they are magnificent, together irrepressible. Fearless in their passion, they are brazen, shameless, unpredictable – ready for each and every explosive encounter. Their attraction is instinctive: they go where they sense danger and each other. Too much is never enough for our young hedonists, who drive each other to live life to the fullest. Again and again, they give in to pleasure and the excitement of breaking the rules.</p>

<p>Gucci Guilty and Gucci Guilty Intense are scents of indulgence and guilty pleasures. Now, in Gucci Guilty Black, the house chooses provocative, glossy black to encase the glowing red and green of its iconic webbing.</p>

<p>GUCCI GUILTY BLACK Pour Homme is a vital GREEN fougère in which dynamism spells seduction:</p>

<p>Top notes:</p>

<p>The scent captures the senses with an explosion of bracing green coriander and invigorating lavender that evokes youthful confidence.</p>

<p>Middle notes:</p>

<p>Its middle motifs celebrate ardent, yet assured masculinity. Aphrodisiac orange flower - stimulating and entrancing - fuses with neroli and richly verdant aromatic notes.</p>

<p>Base notes:</p>

<p>The patchouli that is the hallmark of Gucci fragrances reaches a new potency blended with a lavishly textured cedarwood - intensity at its most alluringly energetic.</p>

<p>Gucci Guilty took the house’s golden entwined Gs and used this emblem as an incitement to subvert. Gucci Guilty Black carries this association still further – never has the coupling within this logo appeared more provocative. The brand is equally famed for its iconic green and red web stripe – signalling both “made in Italy” and “luxury heritage”. here this webbing is transformed into gendered colour schemes: danger-signal red for the Guilty Black heroine, unfettered green for its hero. The flacons are uncompromising bold, black perfection. As one would expect from Gucci, there is great tactile appeal in the bottles’ marriage of high-tech and high style. Giannini notes: “I wanted to create a provocative design for Guilty Black, yet building on the now iconic packaging of Guilty. We added an evocative red glass for the female fragrance, green for the male, as a tribute to the timeless Gucci web stripe.”</p>

<p>The imagery through which the house has brought Gucci Guilty to the world has captured attention: a spectacular combination of director Frank miller’s film noir and Frida Giannini’s sensuality. For this new project, art direction was again overseen by Riccardo Ruini, Creative Director at REm (Ruini e mariotti). Ruini has art directed Gucci’s advertising for the past five years. The campaign for Gucci Guilty Pour Femme won the coveted prize for Best media Campaign at the 2011 US FiFi Awards.</p>

<p>The advertisement was shot at Cinecittà Studios, the legendary home of Italian cinema. Again, its director was Sin City creator Frank miller; its stars femme fatale Evan Rachel Wood and hollywood action hero Chris Evans. Now, in Gucci Guilty Black, we join them for a fresh chapter in their story, and a thrilling sequel to what has come before. The chemistry between them is electric.</p>

<p>Leading fashion photographers Mert &amp; Marcus were again responsible for the print advertising - explosively sensual images in which the gleam of the lovers’ skin is cast in red and green light. Mert &amp; Marcus explain: “We see the couple at night, in flagrante, washed in electric green and red neon. The aura is raw and compelling. very modern, very sexy, very Gucci.”</p>

<p>Gucci Guilty Black Pur Homme is available as 50 and 90ml edt, followed by 90ml after shave and 150ml shower gel.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2352525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352525" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ThompsonObsession23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2284505"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ThompsonObsession23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2284505">ThompsonObsession23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 19:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I only give it a 4 due to longevity.  For Gucci brand I feel like it should project longer.  It's not bad duration at all, but even discounted for $40 for 60 ml it would be great if it did.  However, the scent is wonderful!  It's a fresh clean smell that's polished.  Could be worn universally and most will find it uplifting and refreshing.  I don't get the lower rating aside from longevity really.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2352525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2352525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The green notes keep it crisp and professional. it's actually a refined daily driver that works year round for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2331736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2331736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2330927" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2276356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2276356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262781" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="liikeri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="liikeri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39211">liikeri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 12:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rough, tough, unpolished, green, clean Deodorant!<br />
What’s the fault in that:<br />
Absolutely nothing!<br />
<br />
One of my favourites.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2262781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2262781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>

Now I can’t un-smell that!  I guess the only positive is that it lasts an hour tops.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2235097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2235097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229306" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567332">PerfuMartin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got 50ml for £35. It doesn't last long but the drydown reminds me of a less powdery Prada Infusion D'cedre. If you like to smell your own skin scent throughout the day and don't care about other people smelling you, this is a decent buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225390" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chadchamp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191772"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chadchamp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191772">chadchamp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love the opening. Very fresh and exciting. Has to be my favorite but that's about it. Does not last long at all. I spray 4-5 times and it lasts for like an hour or 2 at most. It's overpriced for the performance but bought to anyways because I like the smell so much.<br />
Smell -9<br />
longevity -3<br />
projection -2<br />
Price -</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2225390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2225390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2203113" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="_fernmoss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2160310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="_fernmoss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2203113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2203113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2160310">_fernmoss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green soap and sweet lavender, with a spicy kick. My partner bought it for me and at first I liked it but felt like it was rather linear and the sillage wasn’t great after the first 10 minutes. <br />
<br />
Fast forward a year and I love this so much. It's so green, basically it's fabric softener (orange blossom/neroli vibe) with fresh cut grass, lavender and a pepper medley (mainly black pepper to my nose.) So easy to throw this on at the office. Longevity is not great but just buy the big 3oz bottle. Will always have this in my collection! Brilliant for summer. It really is true that the ladyfolk love this, likely for its simple irish spring-type masculine energetic woodsy vibe. <br />
<br />
9/10 just because it has a special place in my heart despite its horrible longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2203113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2203113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193511" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017315">Amadeusstella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 16:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a sample of this from microperfumes.com. To my nose this is in the same fresh scent vein as Versace Pour Homme, which is a beautiful fragrance and can be found for a fraction of the price of Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme on discount sites. I get decent performance from my bottle of Versace Pour Homme, usually 5-7 hours and good projection for the first 4 hours. Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme smells great but disappeared off of my skin pretty quickly--less than 1 hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2193511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2193511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Weak performance, 4/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2189252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2189252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187309" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="abahvdbs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1176068.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="abahvdbs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Asad-72821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Asad"title="Asad"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176068">abahvdbs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 14:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Citrus Floral Musk Mildly Green w/ a little Woods<br />
<br />
Opening: Bright fresh orange blossom (orange-citric &amp; white-floral) with what smells like musk in the background, <br />
<br />
as it dries, citrus dies down while it stays white-floral-musky but added with the green notes &amp; a bit of lavender, you can also detect a faint light-spiciness (either from the cedar and/or coriander) &amp; faint patchouli underneath it all which gives it it's masculinity (if it wasn't for the patchouli &amp; cedar GGBPH would be straight feminine)<br />
<br />
not loud mainly in-close projection, last 4-5 hours</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2187309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2187309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2174456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2174456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166330" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hamishthecat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369110"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369110.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hamishthecat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Joop/Wow-Eau-de-Toilette-Fresh-67963.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67963.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wow! Delightful, fresh, clean and simple fragrance. I got a great deal at a discounter that's why I originally bought it. <br />
There are other fragrances that are better in terms of smell and value for money but this will always have a special place in my heart but I can't justify rebuying it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081073" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Biglou88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Biglou88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249102">Biglou88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-03">03/03/24 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’ve done some reviews on this and they haven’t been great. But I’ve given this some consistent wearing recently and even though the sillage is below average, the longevity has surprised me a lot. I’ve been getting at least 5-6 hours which I find reasonable. When I have caught whiffs of this it’s been very nice I must say. When I’ve showered at night I can smell this still which really suprised me. I’ve found this quite addictive as well!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2081073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2081073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077463" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If that's precisely what you looking for then go for it. Be sure that's what you want. <br />
Skin scent about 3 hour, zero sillage. Doesn't matter how many spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2077463"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2077463#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2076390" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is an EDT though, so I’m not really surprised, but even by those standards it’s weak. Skin scent after an hour. Your money is better spent elsewhere if you’re looking for a versatile freshie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2076390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2076390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071677" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alpal420Terps"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1964092"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alpal420Terps" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-Royal-Night-33180.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33180.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One Royal Night"title="The One Royal Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1964092">Alpal420Terps</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 11:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like little trees Black ice on opening to me pretty generic but the dry down is where this one shines drys down to a nice simple and easy to wear yet pleasing fragrance with the touched of patchouli and cedar coming through the base with nice touch if neroli in the midst and the lavender gives a warmer and relaxing feel, not offensive at all, but projection just isn't great after first 30 minutes it settles to basically a skin scent, as some else said is somewhat similar to the Y line but maybe more like Y EDP Intense due to the extra dry woods and patchouli.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2071677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2071677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2054135" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2054135" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JeremyNurse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1756702.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JeremyNurse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2054135ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2054135" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756702">JeremyNurse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-06">02/06/24 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fragrance snobs are gonna hate on this one. But the ladies frickin love it! It's bright, fresh, clean smelling. Is it a mind blowing niche fragrance? Nope. But does it smell good? yes. Will this get you loads of unsolicited compliments from the ladies especially say college age to mid 30s? Absolutely! If you are trying to impress a fragrance snob this won't do it. Go buy something from Creed, LV or initio for that. But if you want a grab and go fragrance that will get you compliments and the digits of that fine honey at the gym, coffee barista, nurse or random babe at the store? If that's what you want go for it! You can find it for a good price on discounters and hey, it just works.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2054135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2054135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2029112" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="masonjarjar1969"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1073523.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="masonjarjar1969" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Supreme-Cashmere-43529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Supreme Cashmere"title="Polo Supreme Cashmere"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2029112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2029112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073523">masonjarjar1969</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 14:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There isn’t much point in analyzing this one to death.  It’s not complex or even all that interesting.  Certainly not trying to be something you’d think was more expensive.  It just smells good and it’s something I like to wear in the warmer months.  But really anytime.  Good memories.  Good feelings.  Come on folks. This is like a Toyota Camry. You can complain that it’s not a BMW or any expensive car you like but it kind of doesn’t make sense.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2029112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2029112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017277" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But dries down very nicely, just let it cook.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2017277"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2017277#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017096" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zanerkand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1578959"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1578959.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zanerkand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017096ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017096" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1578959">Zanerkand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As mentioned many times below, longevity is terrible, and this is far from cheap so value for money is poor.<br />
<br />
It goes through its lifecycle in about an hour sadly. Beautiful lavender opening and dries down to cedar quite quickly.<br />
<br />
But you could put 10 sprays on and it wouldn't matter; it doesn't last.<br />
<br />
This is a shame because it is lovely.<br />
<br />
6/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2017096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2017096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; blooms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1485244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scents &amp; blooms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-M/Le-Soleil-Brille-23748.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23748.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Soleil Brille"title="Le Soleil Brille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1963574ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1963574" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1485244">Scents &amp; blooms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-29">10/29/23 09:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stunningly beautiful on my skin! Can’t stop sniffing my wrist. Longevity &amp; projection not bad! I have had compliments from strangers even a good 4h after although I couldn’t smell it on me after 3h. <br />
<br />
One thing I can not stand is Dupe brands recommending their own brands on Frangrantica pretending they are reviewing but recommending their own dupe brand! Unacceptable! <br />
Don’t fall for dupes &amp; recommendations here as it is the dupe brand themselves plugging up their mediocre dupes! There is one such dupe brand below being recommended! This is not the place to advertise your dupe perfume brand! <br />
<br />
I used to think dupes were a good bargain initially until I tried the original! Never again! In my experience dupe perfumes rarely ever smell the same throughout it’s scent journey on your skin.<br />
They may get it close to the original in top notes but usually the heart &amp; dry down of dupes smell cheap or very different! This is because often the dupe brands will go for the cheaper alternative aroma molecules rather than the more premium aroma molecules/Absolutes/essential oils/natural resins that a designer brand can afford to use &amp; will use in their formulas. I studied perfumery &amp; I can see this in many dupe  Scents! <br />
<br />
My advice would be rather than buy dupes or buy decants ( which can often be dupes too),if you want to try a sample,  instead test samples in department stores or original brand shops or duty free airports &amp; let the scent develop on your skin throughout the day before you commit to a purchase &amp; when you decide to purchase, rather treat yourself to the original  &amp; if it is too expensive, save up to buying the original as a treat for your birthday or Christmas etc There are sales sometimes over Christmas period so you can get a better deal. <br />
<br />
Or instead of wasting money on dupes &amp; decants, go for niche perfume brands that don’t cost a fortune but make their own stunning scents but do not make copies of other brands. Or brands like Zara who have collaborated with Jo Malone,the perfumer &amp; entrepreneur herself to come up with a range of stunning,super quality yet affordable Perfumes! Go for original be it designer,niche brand or store brand,never support dupes!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1963574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1963574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Identical. You literally could just use that instead of this, longevity is about the same. <br />
<br />
I like that ‘green’ fresh smell but I wouldn’t ever buy this. It left me wanting a more powerful, layered and interesting green scent.<br />
<br />

It is green, fresh and creamy. I don't understand the low score. Maybe it was a little bit ahead of it's time. <br />
<br />
It is long lasting, but the sillage had to be better. It becomes a skin scent very fast. So people around you can't enjoy what you are enjoying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1909228"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1909228#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1899858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Hardly any sillage. Gone in less than 4 hours. Bought from Jomashop.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1899858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1899858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1875137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1875137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1875137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1874634" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eliseoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eliseoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-Le-Parfum-23099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"title="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1874634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1874634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757132">eliseoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-09">07/09/23 05:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>so idk if anyone else has a sweet spot for spraying cologne, for me its my inner elbow, it lasts and projects for HOURS, and takes longer for the fragrance to go from the top note to the base note. i love everything about this fragrance, this is my signature and i love it so much. not for winter? no problem, i got my gucci guilty absolute B)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1874634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1874634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1868742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1868742" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skaccomatto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/209392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.209392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="skaccomatto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Eau-Givree-72439.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72439.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"title="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1868742ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1868742" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/209392">skaccomatto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-01">07/01/23 08:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Demi-sec green lavander? Count me in! Gucci Guilty Black is a slightly greener take on the original Gucci Guilty, with some of the sweetness slightly toned down and the aromatics amped up a notch.<br />
<br />
The opening has the Gucci Guilty DNA through and through, with the additional coriander notes being clearly noticeable and providing the green aspect to this fragrance. It's fresh and uplifting without having citruses and this differentiates it from most of its peers. <br />
<br />
There is faint floral note (orange blossoms and neroli, judging by the breakdown) showing up after a few minutes that provides some additional sparkles and sweetness. <br />
<br />
Pencil shavings (cedar) and, to me, some clean musks are all joining the party pretty quickly and it is remarkable how this scent remains stable for the rest of its life, which is around 6/7 hours on my skin, with the last few hours as a skin scent. Projection is pretty good for the first hour or so, rapidly dissipating after that. <br />
<br />
This scent will not turn heads, but it has an overall nice profile and is well put together, making you feel fresh, clean and with a slight green tinge that screams "spring has come"; could be also appropriate for summer nights out. The bottle is very nice, with the dark green glass nicely contrasting the black side; my bottle has the batch code 3027 from Jan 2023. Overall, a decent like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1868742"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1868742#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1868019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1868019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="willnpc40"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="willnpc40" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1868019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1868019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234823">willnpc40</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-30">06/30/23 08:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a bottle at an excellent price (under $30 for a 50ml) and think its really good for the price. You can tell its quality because its lasts a long time (6 + hours). <br />
<br />
It is quite unisex but just enough to make it male IMO. It is very fresh, powdery, and green so its great for daytime use. <br />
<br />
7.5/10 - Great quality freshie</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1868019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1868019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1861541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is textbook what I think a basic fresh masculine scent is. That’s not a bad thing, and the scent isn’t bad at all. It’s quite refreshing with a few drop like quality to it. Not a fan of the longevity though. It’s gone off me after like 20 minutes in this summer heat. <br />
<br />
It’s nothing groundbreaking, and I don’t think it’s trying to be groundbreaking. A very ok scent to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1861541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1861541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1858050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Soapy. But doesn't last long enough to appreciate. Maybe around an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1849170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1849170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1829376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1829376" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cdub5_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1353041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cdub5_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1829376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1829376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353041">Cdub5_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-10">05/10/23 06:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In my opinion this is one the best releases in the whole Guilty line.  In fact, this whole Guilty line is really starting to grow on me after snubbing it early on.  Better late than never I guess.<br />
<br />
I'm afraid the true appreciation for the Guilty Black fragrance won't become apparent until Gucci discontinues it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1829376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1829376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1813338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1813338" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monsieur.moustache"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monsieur.moustache" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1813338ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1813338" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574">monsieur.moustache</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-20">04/20/23 07:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells great! 👍 <br />
<br />
However, longevity and sillage are subpar. Perhaps an EDP formulation would fix this.<br />
<br />
EDIT: Longevity is actually not that bad. Projection does appear to drop precipitously shortly after application, but then it plateaus and sticks around for the rest of the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; There is a fair similarity to Guilty EDP, which is fine. I very much like the scent profile, but the performance is dismal.  To get somewhat reasonable longevity, it's 14 minimum and even then it doesnt punch everyone in the face and still gives out within a few short hours.  Pretty disappointing because there isn't a whole lot that's disagreeable with how it smells.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1803151"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1803151#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1794791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672974">Steve907</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-28">03/28/23 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I attempted to try this after hearing about it on the Real Men Real Style YouTube channel. I ended up with a decant of Gucci Guilty Pour Homme. I didn't like that wood in the dry down so much but for some reason that I can't remember, I had faith in Gucci Guilty Black being good and I bought a bottle. I really enjoy it. Smells fresh with some character. Performance issues? Not my bottle. I can work with this on for a full 8 hour shift and still smell it when I go home. This is my dumb grab bottle if I'm running short on time and can't decide what to wear. Occasionally it feels slightly too heavy in the opening during warmer weather, but it ends up good every time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1794791"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1794791#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1793580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
