Safe blind buy for who want a safe office fragrance which will pull a lot of compliments. It’s not unique but it’s very good blended. Smooth, average sillage and good longevity, not a beast mode fragrance but it worth the price tag for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1790901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1790901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786759" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Roman86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/717236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.717236.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Roman86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/717236">Roman86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-18">03/18/23 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a warm weather, clean, soapy, fresh scent without a whole lot of character. It's generic and I think you can get much cheaper fresh and clean fragrances that are better than this. This is just okay at best. Given the price that Gucci fragrances go for it's just not worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1786759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1786759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1781629" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1781629" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coola265"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1636391"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1636391.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coola265" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1781629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1781629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1636391">Coola265</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-12">03/12/23 07:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am not a fragrance snob, But I absolutely hate guilty black. The longevity was extremely poor on my skin, and the scent was extremely unchanging. The only thing I smell is synthetic watermelon through and through, dont pick up on any other notes at all. Now that would be alright if Gucci was selling this for like 80 bucks canadian, but i believe I paid 140-150 canadian. And thats not even for a full 100mls, thats for 90mls. Total joke. I smashed the bottle for a review I did on youtube, partially as a joke, but partially because Im ashamed that I spent so much money on something im never going to use because of the boringness behind it and because of the fact that the scent doesnt evolve on dry down. I recommend trying before you buy. I also recommend Mont Blanc Legend Spirit as a cheaper/better alternative to this. Trust me, if youre at a fragrance shop, spray one of each on yourself and youll notice the similarities and just how well done the Mont Blanc is by comparison. But hey, thats just my opinion, maybe you love this scent. More power to ya.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1781629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1781629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1777916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Underrated by men but women know about it and love it. Green and fresh but something spicy about it. Got to overspray to project. Unlikely to offend anyone. But women love it that's what's important. I compare it to ysl y edp if you remove the blue notes. Still my signature scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1777916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1777916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1777587" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It’s a fresh patchouli &amp; lavender dominated. The notes go great together, but just a tad too synthetic for my nose &amp; I start to get a headache after a couple hours… but GOD the shit is seductive. Dark, light &amp; fresh at the same time. There’s a cooling sensation I get when wearing it.<br />
Could be worn year round, but best suited for evenings into the night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1775020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1775020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1767014" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
yes, this does not last long BUT for the time you do have its projection and sillage on your side, if anyone can get a whiff of this off you, they will be impressed<br />
<br />
this is such a nice green fragrance<br />
<br />
i would suggest due to the poor performance, stick to wearing this on date nights or close encounters where you maximize the 2-5 hours of projection you'll get<br />
<br />
i spray one on each side of my neck, two times on back of neck, one on back of each hand and i would say i get at least 3 good hours where i have a decent projection outside of my own personal space<br />
<br />
good luck fellas ✅</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1729992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1729992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1722755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722755" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Justinwion"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1643986"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1643986.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Justinwion" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); I had sprayed plenty and reapplied and was in close proximity of people and they didn’t know I was wearing anything.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1722755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1722755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1701652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1701652" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SoupGod"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1434594.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SoupGod" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Météore"title="Météore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1701652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1701652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434594">SoupGod</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-03">12/03/22 21:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I own gucci pour homme (great but doesnt last), and tried guilty and really liked the DNA but thought it was a little generic and weak projection. I've noticed people have been saying the same for the black line as well but I disagree.  Although it is a fresh soapy fragrance something about it is unique and has me smelling my wrist all day like a weirdo. Overall the projection is solid better then I thought but definitely not a beast by any means. I really like this fragrance though overall my best blind buy, very versatile for any situation and very safe and smooth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1701652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1701652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1697067" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="binbabalu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265756"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1265756.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="binbabalu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Pour-Homme-Parfum-71378.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71378.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Parfum"title="Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1697067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1697067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265756">binbabalu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-27">11/27/22 08:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love fresh frags &amp; love how this works for me. Slightly Sweet, Fresh, depth in drydown, I guess synthetic but that is plenty ok because this just smells great. This is one to just spray and go anywhere, anytime, perfect sig scent type. Killer on Summer nights, This is my favorite of the entire guilty line.<br />
<br />
Easily one of my most versatile and always wakes me up and puts me in a good mind set in mornings......Performance is great for a freshie...I can smell this 8 hours after work faintly but it is there all day. Not a beast, not supposed to be.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1697067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1697067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1678202" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1678202" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Higor Valente"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1389099.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Higor Valente" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Light-Blue-Eau-Intense-Pour-Homme-44035.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44035.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Light Blue Eau Intense Pour Homme"title="Light Blue Eau Intense Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1678202ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1678202" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389099">Higor Valente</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-31">10/31/22 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If it was called Gucci Guilty Green will make way more sense... It's is fresh, it is sharp, it is like a forest in spring or a jungle in the authum... I don't understand all the hate about it, to me is quite a pleasant fragrance ! The drydown is a little creamy for me, but in a nice way, in the amount of Tonka/Vanilla around this is way better than the regular ones. <br />
Price: Overpriced 140CAD$ at Shoppers wtf<br />
Fragrance: Well balanced and fresh<br />
Sillage: Works well, don't be afraid of over spray, because it is fantastic smell and not to much invasive, but still bold. <br />
Longevity: Something between 6-7h on my skin<br />
Overall rating: 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1678202"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1678202#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1676050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1676050" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lwhaymand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lwhaymand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1676050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1676050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298290">lwhaymand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-28">10/28/22 07:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No idea why this is called 'Black'. You'd think a flanker with this name would be darker and heavier. But no, I was actually quite shocked at how boring and ordinary this is. It's citrusy, aromatic, and floral, and gets a bit sweeter into the dry-down. Along with every other designer fragrance in the world. Still smells pleasant, but absolutely nothing to shout about.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1676050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1676050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1666174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1666174" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ole_Factory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589321"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ole_Factory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1666174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1666174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589321">Ole_Factory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-14">10/14/22 14:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All the criticisms are valid: A bit generic, not great performance, etc.<br />
<br />
Having said that, this is a staple in my collection for spring and summer days when I want to smell good without making a statement. It's a fairly linear combo of fresh green with dry woody base and a faint salty/aquatic accord in the background. The comparisons to a fancy Irish Spring body wash are pretty accurate.<br />
<br />
What I like most about this cologne is that it's very energizing. May seem odd but whenever I wear this I feel more alert and clear-headed. It's an invigorating scent. Perfect office scent.<br />
<br />
It might be a bit overpriced but I think it's underrated based on the reviews. If you like green freshies this is definitely one to take a look at.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1666174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1666174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1645144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1645144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1645144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1634870" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1634870" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="artos88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1375101"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="artos88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1634870ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1634870" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1375101">artos88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-31">08/31/22 01:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one reminds me of an Axe bodywash, i think it was called sage and cedarwood. For me it falls in the same category as MB Legend or AF Fierce. Clean showergel but boring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1634870"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1634870#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1629945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1629945" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="REY760"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557571"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="REY760" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/L-Heure-Verte-68324.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68324.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Heure Verte"title="L'Heure Verte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1629945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1629945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557571">REY760</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-23">08/23/22 16:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is too much of a synthetic smell. The smell lasts about 30 mins and than it fades. There is a soapy smell at the end of it. Its quite repulsive. One reviewer did say this is a "safe" cologne and this would be ideal for people seeking that "safe" synthetic smell. Actually, if you are trying to be "safe" I would go with Gucci Guilty, the entry is synthetic but it works well with that lavender vanilla smell that hangs around.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1629945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1629945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1627837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1627837" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Riztory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1517192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Riztory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bentley/Bentley-for-Men-Intense-17666.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17666.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bentley for Men Intense"title="Bentley for Men Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1627837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1627837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517192">Riztory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-20">08/20/22 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Modern day Brut is what comes to my mind when I wear this fragrance. Both in performance and fragrance structure/feel. Kind of surprised it came out in 2013, I think it would have done better if it were released these days considering releases like H24 and Beau De Jour rather than when blue fragrances were just about to take off. <br />
<br />
I haven’t run into a top note heavy fragrance, didn’t think it was a thing before coming across this. The opening is just fantastic with the lavender and coriander mixed with a herbal tone, but looses steam in a hurry as it drys down to a ambroxan / patchouli/ cedar type mix. That opening is definitely a stunner though. <br />
<br />
Same thing can be said about performance as it’s pretty bright initially but runs its course pretty quickly. A politically correct 80’s powerhouse fragrance as ironic as that is. This is a fragrance that I root for being so much more powerful as it has the composition to do so, but as in life there is a time and place for everything. I can’t help to think this invokes the memories of when Gucci was producing the likes of Gucci Nobile and what could have been if that was still in production today. An ode to Gucci’s past, but a little more than half baked.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1627837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1627837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1581185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1581185" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="a_c_thompson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349135"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1349135.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="a_c_thompson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/H24-65147.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65147.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="H24"title="H24"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1581185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1581185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349135">a_c_thompson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-09">06/09/22 14:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love how this smells. It fits right in with my style of fragrances.<br />
I think it work for almost any situation. I do think it is best for like an office type situation. Someplace where you want to smell good but you don't want to be too in your face.<br />
I kind of hate the term, but I would say this is one of those "modern masculine scents".<br />
It's fresh, clean, green, and slightly woodsy. No real sweetness here.<br />
It could easily dress up or dress down. I do wish it lasted longer, but for how fresh it is I'm not surprised. But I do easily get 6 hours out of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1581185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1581185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1570175" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Candyandy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222545"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1222545.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Candyandy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1570175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1570175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222545">Candyandy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-24">05/24/22 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's green, it's fresh, it's got a strange thing going on where it feels unique and generic at the same time. This version is very much in line with the rest of the Guilty line but it has some extra darkness on top. The coriander is dark and kind of bitter and an interesting addition to the Guilty DNA. Still, if you own any frag from this line except Absolute or Cologne which go in their own directions, then this can easily be redundant.<br />
Overall Guilty Black is one of those scents that don't do really anything wrong but also don't do enough right to warrant excitement. You can see it across all the reviews here too, people don't really have anything against it, but this isn't anyone's favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1570175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1570175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nothing special. I wore it to work and a couple of colleagues complimented it. <br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1570155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1570155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1564683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1564683" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rickysmellsgood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504350"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rickysmellsgood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1564683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1564683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504350">rickysmellsgood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-15">05/15/22 17:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>its alright.. the price is also.. alright. it smells like shower gel. more like fancy shower gel. also it does not last long, 1 hour TOPS. if you want something new and fresh this would be an ok option. also the bottle is pretty mediocre. other than that its a decent fragrance. if you dont want to smell like everyone else then this would actually be a pretty good option. i havent ran into anyone wearing this cologne. so yeah if you ever see gucci guilty at a store or something i say give it a whiff and see how you feel about it :) p.s ur gonna be reapplying like a mf.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1564683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1564683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1553006" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1553006" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dsgnmind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480012"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1480012.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dsgnmind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1553006ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1553006" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480012">dsgnmind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-28">04/28/22 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I write my reviews for my own future reference.<br />
<br />
Opening was generic alcoholic, but with the undercurrent of fragrance. As a noob, I'm starting to really experience the difference between luxury fragrances and these mainstream fragrances. As it dries down, I do get a general soapy but not overtly soapy note, kinda like whatever that popular Irish brand soap was, but less soapy and more Irish Spring (that's it!). I don't really get a lavender or any other notes. It is a darker tone than other mainstream fragrances, but I don't see it as very guilty or dark as the name suggests. That name suggests something sexy, this smells more clean and after shower. If I bought a nice laundry detergent that was advertised as "deep forest" (not the Musical Star Streams DJ) I'd expect it to smell something like this. A nice fresh clothes hamper smell, a teenager who needs to cover up BO, but has more panache than defaulting to body spray. Not what I was expecting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1553006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1553006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1534998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Literally smells like shower gel but more elegant and dressed up notes. Smells very fresh and masculine and a good crowd pleaser. This is a green and woody fragrance you can smell it on your skin for 11 hours but after 6 hours the projection dies down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1528079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1528079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527368" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527368" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="puri27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1367725"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1367725.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="puri27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Davidoff/Cool-Water-Wave-44618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cool Water Wave"title="Cool Water Wave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527368ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527368" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); This perfume is a treasure for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1527368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1527368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1516921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1516921" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michael_D911"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450072"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1450072.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michael_D911" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1516921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1516921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450072">Michael_D911</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-05">03/05/22 03:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is a really nice fresh, green, earthy fragrance. The main issue I have with this is the performance. It is probably my worst performing fragrances. I spray it on my hand and it is completely gone within one hour. <br />
The only situation that this works for me and the perfect use for this is when going to workout at the gym. It is the perfect gym scent and will last for your workout, but not much longer.<br />
If the performance was much better, this would be an incredible fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1516921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1516921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1507239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1507239" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fatihhh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1016467"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fatihhh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-9099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel"title="Bleu de Chanel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1507239ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1507239" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1504342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AbdoulAllie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AbdoulAllie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Al-Areeq-Gold-82810.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82810.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Al Areeq Gold"title="Al Areeq Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1504342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1504342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); A great one from Gucci, very aromatic, fresh and incredibly one to keep... It's very harsh in the opening but the dry down makes this juice worth it... Try it out fellas...<br />
<br />
7.9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1504342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1504342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1495295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I dont understand why? Granted, its nothing uber-sexy, but its not bad to say the least. Fact is, its better than many of the arty farty fragrances that people so want to love.... In terms of uniqueness it has outdone many and is presented well too. In fact when i stumbled upon it, which did not happen earlier mostly because of the negative reviews, i was quite taken aback. One should try out fragrances, despite what others say about it... U never know what u might be missing!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1495295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1495295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1479748" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
