padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1477673" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="exceptionell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428020"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1428020.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="exceptionell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-L-Homme-Bleu-Electrique-67997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de L'Homme Bleu Électrique"title="La Nuit de L'Homme Bleu Électrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1477673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1477673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428020">exceptionell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-06">01/06/22 13:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't like the opening, synthetic and generic, but the dry down and the smell it leaves on clothes is amazing. 4/10 opening, 9/10 dry down</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1477673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1477673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1477010" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1477010" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="M1tsouko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1390623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1390623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="M1tsouko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-38686.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38686.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted"title="Wanted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1477010ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1477010" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1390623">M1tsouko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-05">01/05/22 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had the gucci guilty edt in a travel spray when I was in elementary school and from what i remember, it was strong. Like, pulverizing strong. The patchouli and the coriander hit you like a brick. It goes away after a few seconds but it's enough to make your hair stand up on end. But overall really just the opening is strong, nothing else really memorable about this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1477010"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1477010#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1476969" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1476969" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BigMommyMilkers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BigMommyMilkers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-734.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.734.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme"title="L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1476969ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1476969" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327146">BigMommyMilkers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-05">01/05/22 14:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What can I say about this fragrance, it's a nice and safe Green fragrance suitable all year around. Everyone will love this fragrance, whether you are big into fragrances or not, it's a safe bet and gets quite a few compliments. It does smell a bit synthetic like people have mentioned, but it's not the overwhelming synthetic smell that other Green fragrances have. <br />
<br />
As briefly mentioned, the versatility of this fragrance is phenomenal, all year around for any occasions, no matter the kind of man you are. Masculine? Go for it. Flamboyant? Yes sir. It is a long-running line of Gucci - even having a new release this year, Gucci Guilty Parfum Pour Homme. It is a safe blind buy fragrance, ignore what the negative comments are saying, it is fully worth it. If you can, go for the 100ml. I'm saying this for the mass versatility you get with it, it doesn't have the best longevity, but again you can overspray, and it won't be offensive.<br />
<br />
It is mass appealing and nothing unique even within the Guilty line, but it is a safe entry and starter scent to both the Gucci line and to start your fragrance collection. I have had many compliments wearing this scent from friends and family to people who I walk past, it's not an attention grabber by any stretch of the mile.<br />
<br />
Overall, a safe blind buy for all age ranges, for all occasions and seasons. I would lean into it being ever so-slightly uni-sex, but that's just my opinion. This was the first fragrance I had bought, so it has a soft spot for me and I could never hate on it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1476969"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1476969#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1467965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1467965" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragChronic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1166079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1166079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragChronic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Guilty-Elixir-de-Parfum-pour-Homme-84547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme"title="Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1467965ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1467965" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1166079">FragChronic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-21">12/21/21 14:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice GREEN , soapy, lavender fragrance, much better than the 3.6 rating, don't let the 'Black" throw you off , this is a inoffensive clean fresh scent, I have many lavender scents but this one is unique in it's greenness , The performance isn't as bad as people say either, a guy at work wears this and I twice asked him what he was wearing and he said Gucci Black , so it must project pretty well. This is a great, manly , office or work scent, not to much to offend anyone but still masculine. Hard to find this one too, must be discontinued and supplies are drying up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1467965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1467965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1455276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1455276" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cp4044404"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379779"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cp4044404" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-Water-Splash-54677.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54677.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L’Homme Water Splash"title="Prada L’Homme Water Splash"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1455276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1455276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379779">cp4044404</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-30">11/30/21 20:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't like it, gives me a cat pee vibe. Glad I got it as a gift because I would never spend my own money on this and you shouldn't either!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1455276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1455276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1449466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1449466" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jayariz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399561"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1399561.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jayariz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/City-Of-Stars-73344.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73344.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="City Of Stars"title="City Of Stars"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1449466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1449466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399561">jayariz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-20">11/20/21 18:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I only leave this review as I believe we all have a bond with our first bottles of perfume in our life. For me, it's Gucci Guilty. I had the original Gucci Guilty back in 2011 when I was a sophomore in high school. The memories this brings me back to are family trips and falling for this girl at a private school. It brings me back to high school, being a young bachelor and catching feelings for the ladies. <br />
<br />
I realize this is not an objective review and that's intentional. I write this review to pay homage, to my favorite juice perhaps because you never forget your first love.<br />
<br />
It's fall 2011, and I'm kissing my crush at the carnival, good memories!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1449466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1449466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1439701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1439701" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mike11798"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1401180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mike11798" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1439701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1439701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1401180">Mike11798</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-03">11/03/21 20:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is a bit of a mixed bag. It's not the nicest fragrance I've ever smelt, but it has some positives. <br />
<br />
Pros: <br />
- Seasonal Versatility: I have gotten use out of this in pretty much every season and, in my opinion, its performance and scent doesn't change much from one season to the next. <br />
- Good Casual Fragrance, but Can Be Dressed Up: This one is good for casual afternoons, as well as a night out, so there is some versatility as far as use, too.<br />
- Clean: It's a pretty light and clean-smelling fragrance, and pleasant for the most part.<br />
<br />
Cons:<br />
- Smells Synthetic: The main problem with this fragrance, is it smells incredibly synthetic. There is almost nothing about this that smells natural. It is an interesting combination of floral, woody and sweet, but that does not produce a particularly natural smell.<br />
- Smells Inexpensive: Along the lines of the fact that it smells synthetic, it also smells inexpensive. It does not smell like a high-end fragrance you would expect from Gucci.<br />
- Performance: Not great in terms of longevity. It projects decently well at first, but as it wears on, its performance decreases quickly<br />
reat <br />
Overall: 5.5 / 10<br />
I seem to be in the minority that finds this fragrance just average. It's pretty polarizing, which is surprising because it's not a great scent, but also doesn't lend itself to too much criticism as a clean, crisp and aromatic fragrance. However, I would recommend trying others first. Not worth a buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1439701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1439701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1438905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1438905" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The_Professor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370426"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370426.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="The_Professor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1438905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1438905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370426">The_Professor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-02">11/02/21 09:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Underated but one of the best if not modern Fougere designer fragrance. Safe clean masculine scent. Innofensive but yet provocative for a man who want to cause the impression of a clean good smelling guy and simple for day or night . Woman's love it.<br />
Lavender soap and very green smell is the perfect description for this scent. The drydown in cloth smells beautiful. <br />
Probably it last 3 hours max on skin more on cloth. So don't be afraid to overspray <br />
Presentation : 8/10<br />
Longevity: 5/10<br />
Smell: 7/10<br />
Versatility: 8/10<br />
Compliments: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1438905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1438905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1426582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1426582" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FelixM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1326035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FelixM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Giò Profondo"title="Acqua di Giò Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1426582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1426582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326035">FelixM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-11">10/11/21 20:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like lots of people who own this fragrance this was my entry into the designer realm. This is one that I told myself I would never buy as it is known as a very teenage fragrance, however when I was in a department store in the local mall and picked up the bottle. First impressions loved it and picked it up right away, however now when I spray it on I am overpowered by the lavender note, still though this is an amazing fragrance and I do still find my self reaching for it every so often.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1426582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1426582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1416211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1416211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scilmeara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392320"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scilmeara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1416211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1416211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392320">Scilmeara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-24">09/24/21 08:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not opposed to trying men's fragrances if I like the description, but I feel like they rarely end up smelling as described. 90% of them just end up smelling like my dad's shaving cream to me. It's not a bad smell, but it's not particularly interesting, and it's kind of a shame that so many different brands charge so much to make people smell like a barber's shop.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1416211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1416211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1409777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1409777" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentedMan3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376023"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1376023.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentedMan3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-16938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus"title="Pegasus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1409777ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1409777" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376023">ScentedMan3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-13">09/13/21 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been thinking why this has gotten bad reveiws for a few weeks now.  It is an inoffensive fragrance that is very clean smelling and in my opinion somewhat versatile.  <br />
I mean let's be honest with ourselves here....  Go to any department store and ask the perfumist people how the sales are for this.  They will tell you that it's the best selling in the line and it's been out how many years now, like 8 years...  <br />
Dont get me wrong there are many other fragrances out there that I would prefer over this at its price point.  I say that because I prefer longer lasting and stronger performance then what this gives.  If this lasted longer and projected better for longer this would be fantastic and a great buy for me.  <br />
It's a good date night scent that women enjoy or a no thought spray and go safe scent.<br />
In the end I understand that the enjoyment of any fragrance is subjective.  So definitely sample it first before spending your money just like any other fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1409777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1409777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1406525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335525">rosetinteddream</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-08">09/08/21 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first I didn’t understand the low ratings for this. After growing my collection and smelling better quality fragrances...I get it now. The Gucci Guilty line seems pretty sub par to me. It smells synthetic, and cheap. Not knocking anyone who likes this, perhaps I’m too harsh of this line. I did make the mistake of blind buying this and Gucci Guilty Love Edition, so thats on me. But I’ll probably never buy another Gucci fragrance after this.<br />
<br />
🥀</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1406525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1406525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1396787" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364860">eewatts23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-22">08/22/21 03:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells a little to soapy for me. Also, it doesn't do so well in the heat. You're going to think that I am exaggerating but I swear that in Thailand climate the stuff evaporated in about 25 minutes. I couldn't even smell a trace of it within 50 minutes and I doused my arms in it and even my armpits (I know, gross, but god this has to be the worst performing fragrance I've ever bought). I'd rather have polo green any day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1396787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1396787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1388187" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1367922">SomebodyToKnow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-07">08/07/21 05:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a 5/5 scent for me. In my opinion,this falls into the category of almost a contemporary Drakkar Noir. It's dark,soapy,fresh and clean,naughty, mature,extremely masculine and..Yeah.."Guilty".  Suitable for both summer and winter, preferably night outs. I've analysed thoroughly this scent and have come to the conclusion that it is perfectly designed to make the woman brain crave for it. This is why this sells like crazy 8 years after its release. Do not judge by the comments,just grab yourself a bottle and become a kinky boy,just for a night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1388187"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1388187#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1381213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Women love it, It's extremely versatile and isn't boring the way many green fragrances are with the soapy profile. There's a darkness and a spiciness to it that make you think twice and <br />
<br />
The performance is a joke, but I've blind tested dozens of women so if you're on the market it's worth the shot. I don't care for it, and I noticed most men don't care for green frags, but this one hits different.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1381213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1381213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1371657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This one is more green and herbal while the other is more soap and musk. Both performs about the same. I like GGB a lot better because of the unique green notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1369853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1369853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1366056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1366056" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RobCranford"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223953"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="RobCranford" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Oud-21402.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21402.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Oud"title="Tobacco Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1366056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1366056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223953">RobCranford</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-25">06/25/21 18:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>GUCCI GUILTY BLACK<br />
6/25/21<br />
<br />
This should have been called Gucci Guilty GREEN.  Without a doubt.  6-8 sprays yields a nice fresh, green scent for 3 hours only.  2013 bottle.  I like it.  For casual use only.  A good dumb-reach for warm/hot weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1366056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1366056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1362858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1302419" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Iorni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1268242"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1268242.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Iorni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1302419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1302419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1268242">Iorni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-04">03/04/21 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is by far the best compliment getter from all fragrances I've ever owned. Very fresh, clean, and masculine scent. To me it's versatile enough that I can pull it off anywhere anytime, winter, summer, day or night and ladies absolutely love it.  Doesn't last an eternity but it holds up for the majority of the day, noticed the smell lasts longer sprayed on clothes than on my skin so something to consider. Very appreciated in Eastern and Northern Europe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1302419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1302419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1292985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; soundtrack: tulio di piscopo - stop bajon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1292985"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1292985#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1291844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1291844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sameenuk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277385"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1277385.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sameenuk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1291844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1291844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277385">sameenuk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-13">02/13/21 04:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To give it's due. It definitely lasts a while. Still on my clothes a day later and the patchilouli base is very pleasant..<br />
<br />
The initial opening is a bit overwhelming on its lavender. Strong but a clear statement so I appreciate it. But it dries down into a strangely floral scent.<br />
<br />
Someone once said if batman had a scent, this is what he would wear. I laughed at that but now I think maybe so.<br />
<br />
I think the scent itself is a moderate rather than a knockout. Not quite a reach but still ok. I personally prefer others.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1291844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1291844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1282597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; really underrated perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1281396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1281396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1281346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1281346" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SocalSJR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250480"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SocalSJR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Carbon-43402.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43402.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Carbon"title="Luna Rossa Carbon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1281346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1281346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250480">SocalSJR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-24">01/24/21 21:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Decent fragrance, overhyped and burned out. I can’t walk into a corner store like 711 or even at my local Target without smelling this on everyone. Smelled very generic like most fragrances out, I’d rather pick something a bit more worthwhile. Gucci guilty black is a bit boring. Longevity wasn’t the greatest. I had a gift set of this and gave the entire set away, it just didn’t grow on me. Would I recommend this fragrance? Probably not, find a better scent that isn’t so widely used something more unique.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1281346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1281346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1272718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Had to take extra whiffs.  Shower gel type of scent but interesting.  When I wear it I feel like I’m Batman, this is the kind of scent he’d wear.  <br />
<br />
<br />
Rating: 7/10<br />
Compliments: 8/10 (for the first 2 hours, longevity isn’t the best)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1272718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1272718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1271037" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1271037" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Khaba"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209771"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Khaba" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/GNTONIC-80353.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80353.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="GNTONIC"title="GNTONIC"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1271037ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1271037" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209771">Khaba</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-05">01/05/21 13:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has clean soapy shower gel scent on it but darker, greener with a touch of licorice vibe on it and more subtle than usual blue fragrance.  It has weak projection and longevity, but you can get a whiff of it every now and then.  The scent is light but lingers but you will notice it from time to time where it feels like you are clean and the shower gel or soap you used in the bath.  Safe scent and safe to spray on clothes, 4-6hrs longevity, projection of 1-2 hrs and becomes skin scent but project from time to time if your body heats up, or you get a whiff on your clothes.  Great for day, and night and prefer this over Prada L'homme for office scent as it's so safe and light, which also a bad thing because this fragrance pricey even on discounters for its performance<br />
<br />
additional:  Asked my colleague earlier and this has an elbow to arm length reach scent bubble even after 4hrs, the scent is light and subtle that it doesnt smell like a perfume, she thought she was smelling something nice but can't pin point in the air, she said she is smelling something powdery but can't really tell exactly what it is and when I asked if she smells something like black long gummy candy that is color black (red vines licorice) and then she confirmed that is what she smelling and didn't know it was me.  I guess the sillage is also good as I kinda walk around on that area before asking her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1271037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1271037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1267367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1267367" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nafsta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1287226"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nafsta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1267367ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1267367" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1287226">nafsta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-29">12/29/20 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Good smell, familiar as I've been rocking it since highschool. Nothing amazing but smells good. Doesn't smell like a teenage scent like polo or axe, more like an elevated version. Good for the day or stepping out of the house. Doesn't last too long, and will be unnoticeable within the club with no strong projection (or maybe it's because I'm nose blind to it?). Can't go wrong with it though as a daily and I find it versatile and good for fall/spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1267367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1267367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1265386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1265386" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="foreignshores"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/621579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.621579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="foreignshores" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Joop/Nightflight-1721.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1721.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nightflight"title="Nightflight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1265386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1265386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/621579">foreignshores</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-25">12/25/20 02:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the Guilty line, but I slept on this one for a long time. In fact, I sold my first bottle years ago after I'd worn it all of 2 or 3 times. Picked up a new bottle at a great price earlier this year and it's so refreshing. It has the same DNA as the original, but with a blast of green soapy freshness.  In contrast to what other reviewers have experienced, I find the longevity and projection to be phenomenal! Very glad I decided to revisit this one. Just the thing for me right now 🙂</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1265386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1265386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1263133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1260328" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ghae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275830"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ghae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Fleuve-Tendre-44427.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44427.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleuve Tendre"title="Fleuve Tendre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1260328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1260328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275830">Ghae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-12">12/12/20 20:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance confuses me, its not bad but its not overly good in my opinion i blind bought it, and it like another reviewer states it really does smell like freshly cut grass, it is nice but not really my type exactly, but i will still wear it.<br />
<br />
What confuses me about it though are some of the reviews, and how much people say this is heavily complimented, it smells quite generic almost to me to be recieving such hype, i dont mean nything bad by that, i am glad people enjoy it, it is just suprising as when i bought it i never heard of it before but lately people are going haywire lol.<br />
<br />
if you are a fan of green freshies this is for youi would say it is pretty mass appealing and does smell designer, it does smell a bit synthetic but you get what you pay for i guess, performance i'm not so sure about as i havent worn it enough to have developed a full opinion. From what i have though i would say that its pretty bad, its not what i want in a fragrance.<br />
<br />
i think if you like things like dior higher, channel platinum egoiste, creed irish tweed, everyday/summer/office/safe/mass appealing/green/light earthy/casual scents possibly even date i dont know about club though as i think it would stand out quite a bit ,but yeah if you are into those or looking for some mass appealing ones i woud say its worth a buy, usually i would say it was worth a pass but considering the reviews this gets and compliments people seem to enjoy it alot so there you go!!.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
