padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181238">stephen.redeker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-19">09/19/20 02:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, clean and green. This is a really nice fragrance that tragically has poor performance. If you buy a bottle 2nd hand, like I did ($10 for 30ml), it's a fantastic grab. I can't see paying anything over $40 for this. Sure, you'll smell wonderful. But only for an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1226203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1226203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1217677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1217677" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GreenFresh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244283"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1244283.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GreenFresh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1217677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1217677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244283">GreenFresh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-29">08/29/20 13:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is hands down the best fragrance i ever owned , girls ADORE it , i have received hundreds of compliments about how green and refresing i smell and how much girls love it.<br />
On the downside , the longevity was pretty good when i first bought it when it launched (2013)   , but as all big houses like Dior or Chanel , Armani and so on do , they watered down and now is pretty weak after 1 hour <br />
I also received a lot of compliments from Bleu De Chanel EDT which is also my favourite and use to linger all day on me much more than Gucci Guilty Black , but Chanel also did that and diluted the concentration sadly and it gets very weak sillage after 2hours now<br />
i really do not understand why can't hey make an identical version of this Gucci Guilty Black and call it Perfume or Perfume Extract charge more money but make it WAY MORE CONCENTRATED like it was when it launched or even more<br />
Anyway another favourite of mine was Gris de Montagne Dior amazing longevity ,projection  and sillage best i ever had but for a huge amount of money almost over 300$</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1217677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1217677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1217429" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1217429" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tukangciumparfum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207813"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1207813.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tukangciumparfum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1217429ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1217429" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207813">tukangciumparfum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-28">08/28/20 22:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a sweet citrus dish soap that you use for your dirty dishes. I gladly i didn't buy it because its awful.<br />
It smells one dimensional from the opening till the dry down.<br />
The silage is good though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1217429"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1217429#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1217242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1217242" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alanwake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alanwake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Regime-des-Fleurs/Al-Dukhan-70979.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70979.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Al-Dukhan"title="Al-Dukhan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1217242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1217242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422">alanwake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-28">08/28/20 12:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A clear cut clean and modern fougere. Pretty simple and direct. Its two dimensional and synthetic but in a good way.  It reminds me of a modernized interpretation of YSL's Jazz with the Guilty DNA lingering in the background. Entirely inoffensive and will get you compliments. A great one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1217242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1217242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1211269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1211269" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="piyux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230413"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230413.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="piyux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Intense-2011-13016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Intense 2011"title="Dior Homme Intense 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1211269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1211269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230413">piyux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-13">08/13/20 19:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme Men EDT opens with a moderate projection of green, citrus, spicy, and woody notes. The opening is fresh, aromatic, common, soft, and pleasant. The green notes and the neroli are the most noticeable, the green notes come across as fresh vegetation and foliage; the neroli adds a citrusy accord, evocative of bergamot. The coriander and lavender and soft touches, similarly, the patchouli and cedar are there to enhance the green accords and add a fresh woody touch. The fragrance is relatively linear, all featured notes come up as soon as the fragrance is applied and continue into the dry-down, the only noticeable change is the loss on intensity and projection, the fragrance takes one step down from moderate to low. Once Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme Men EDT has reached its full dry-down, it can be summarized as a low projection, fresh green, citrusy, white floral, and woody fragrance. The fragrance feels casual, clean, delicate, diluted, earthy, faint, elegant, faint, fresh, green, modern, playful, refreshing, sharp, sour, sporty, unisex, versatile, white, woody, and pleasant.<br />
<br />
BATCH REVIEWED: 2020.<br />
WOW RATING: 7/10. A nice, fresh, green, citrusy, and white floral fragrance, but nothing new.<br />
DISLIKE RATING: 0/10. The fragrance contains no harsh or offensive notes.<br />
UNIQUENESS: 6/10. The notes and resulting scent are OK but not unique.<br />
MASS APPEAL: 9/10. This is a fragrance that most people will enjoy.<br />
PROJECTION: 3/10. Moderate to low, about 3 feet around the wearer.<br />
SILLAGE: 3/10. Moderate to low, about 3 feet behind the wearer.<br />
APPLICATION: 8 atomizations.<br />
LONGEVITY: 4/10. Moderate, about 4 hours, but projects very softly.<br />
SEASONS: Spring, summer.<br />
OCCASIONS: Formal events, outdoor gatherings, gym, office, business, casual, holidays, vacations, romantic, dating, clubbing. This is an office-friendly fragrance. <br />
VERSATILITY: 7/10. Very good, a highly versatile fragrance ideal for warm weather.<br />
GENDER: Advertised for men, the notes and resulting scent are unisex.<br />
AGES: Any.<br />
RECOMMENDATION: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme Men EDT can be purchased for about $55, it is a pleasant fresh fragrance, inoffensive, versatile, a personal-space fragrance. It is a nice-to-have but not a must-have.<br />
BLIND-BUY: Yes, but only if you are familiar with its main notes.<br />
SIMILAR: These fragrances in the same genre. Armaf Sauville Men EDP is a very good musky ambroxan, lemon, and spicy peppery fragrance; Armaf Tag Him EDT is a versatile, ginger, mint, pink pepper, and citrus fragrance; Dior Homme Sport EDT is great sweet citrus, woody, vetiver, and ginger fragrance; Ferrari Cedar Essence Men EDP is citrus, pine green, and woody, but lacks performance; Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Men EDT is a good scent, mildly powdery, citrusy, white floral with green and woody accords; Ralph Laurent Polo Ultra Blue is lemon verbena, basil and aquatic fragrance, very pleasant; Versace Dylan Blue is a fantastic blue fragrance featuring citrus, amber, spicy, and aquatic notes; Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme Men EDT is a soft, fresh, green, citrusy, white floral, and woody fragrance.<br />
SUMMARY: A low projection, fresh green, citrusy, white floral, and woody fragrance. The fragrance feels casual, clean, delicate, diluted, earthy, faint, elegant, faint, fresh, green, modern, playful, refreshing, sharp, sour, sporty, unisex, versatile, white, woody, and pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1211269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1211269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1200158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1200158" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Honest Jack"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Honest Jack" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-De-Nuit-Intense-Man-Perfume-Oil-87359.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87359.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club De Nuit Intense Man Perfume Oil"title="Club De Nuit Intense Man Perfume Oil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1200158ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1200158" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241758">Honest Jack</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-16">07/16/20 00:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my south beach, miami fragrance. This fragrance makes me feel ready to have a long night on the town. It has the big lavender, coriander notes in the beginning and soon after transforms to this green, aromatic scent that is great for a night out. Great compliment magnet and in my opinion, scent DNA is unique, but this fragrance is best at night, 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1200158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1200158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1189487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1189487" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BigFragrances"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1225229.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BigFragrances" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51411.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lost Cherry"title="Lost Cherry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1189487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1189487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1225229">BigFragrances</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-17">06/17/20 10:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is clean but not so clean like many say... got something mysterious, something dark - hence the Black in the name - in the composition, which features a strong lavender on top. Longevity is not extreme, but decent. To me, Guilty Black is a spring, night-time fragrance. Definitely got charisma, it's not badass like its big brother Guilty Absolute, but still "badder" than the original EDT.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1189487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1189487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1182965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Truly amazing. A compliment achiever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1182965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1182965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1173684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1173684" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="j.khul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230187"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="j.khul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-for-Men-Eau-de-Parfum-31909.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31909.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One for Men Eau de Parfum"title="The One for Men Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1173684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1173684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230187">j.khul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-09">05/09/20 20:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like Acqua di Gio if it were actually any good. Slightly green, fresh, light, and pleasant. <br />
Seems great for causal wear or to an office, which makes the name of the fragrance honestly kind of odd, which alludes to “indulgence”. It’s not. It’s just pleasant. <br />
Minimal sillage and longevity doesn’t seem great. Probably overpriced. <br />
But I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1173684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1173684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1169610" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1169610" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LoganLedferd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188585"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LoganLedferd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Pour-Homme-II-1119.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1119.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Pour Homme II"title="Gucci Pour Homme II"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1169610ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1169610" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188585">LoganLedferd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-29">04/29/20 21:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice and fresh along with a bit of spiciness. The only thing that hinders this from being an absolute gem is the performance... Even going a bit heavy on the trigger it doesn't go past 5 hours on my skin. This one seems to be around 50-60 bucks and in my opinion that's too much for something like this. Others may disagree but this performance really bums me out cause the scent is INDEED sexy and pretty much any guy can really rock this scent! Shower gel kind of vibe but the coriander and patchouli makes this seem like it should have been named Gucci Guilty Green Pour Homme.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1100987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1100987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1086752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1086752" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yelawolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1024226"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yelawolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Legend-54323.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54323.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invictus Legend"title="Invictus Legend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1086752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1086752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1024226">Yelawolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-11">08/11/19 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was the first fragrance I ever owned I got it as a gift back when it was released. I have so many great memories with this. Dates, hanging outs, night outs, etc. It's a sexy scent. Definitely for sexy young men. I'm thinking about buying it again. <br />
<br />
Longevity: 8 hours or more. <br />
<br />
Sillage/Projection: Very good. Projects until 6 hours then starts to sit closer until it becomes a skin scent.<br />
<br />
Scent: Very strong, but smooth! Absolutely not choking. Hundred times better than the original. It's heavy, but pleasant.<br />
<br />
Occasion (to me): I would wear this to a night out for sure or any type of occasion like that where you want people to notice and smell you or a date for sure!<br />
<br />
<br />
In my opinion it works in any type of weather except for extreme heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1086752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1086752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1084608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1084608" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coffee King"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/368581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.368581.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coffee King" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1084608ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1084608" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/368581">Coffee King</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-04">08/04/19 08:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the only fragrances I genuinely cannot stand, I love the cologne, but this  is foul, it's synthetic beyond belief, and genuinely smells repulsive on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1084608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1084608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1082528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1082528" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smellyoul8ter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1155851"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1155851.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smellyoul8ter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Kobe-6309.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6309.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kobe"title="Kobe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1082528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1082528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1155851">smellyoul8ter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-27">07/27/19 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quick take:<br />
<br />
A solid like from me. Sweet, fresh out of the shower vibe. Safe for casual use and in some work environments. Maybe too playful for a suit and tie. Not like any other “black” scents that I own- which I would describe as mysterious, sensual and usually peppery or boozy. This is not that at all. If you want to make a safe blind buy you’ll make it here. The biggest downside to me is performance. I don’t get much projection and it definitely won’t last an entire workday. This affects the value of the fragrance to me. Though if you buy it you might find yourself reaching for it when you don’t want anything unique, complex or challenging. Those always have a place in my collection. Nice if you’re starting out of just simply like safe scents. Also would make a great gift for any man that simply needs a fragrance. <br />
<br />
7/10 (7.5/10 personal score)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1082528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1082528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1067199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1067199" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JBrit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JBrit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Dylan-Blue-40031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"title="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1067199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1067199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171827">JBrit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-04">06/04/19 21:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scent: 7.5/10<br />
Value: 6.5/10<br />
Longevity: 6/10<br />
Sillage: 6/10<br />
Versatility: 7.5/10<br />
<br />
I'm with the last 4 or 5 reviewers. How can you hate this? This scent is so safe (even blind buy safe). It's is classy, soapy, clean, and masculine. If you hate clean, then leave this alone, if you love clean then quit waiting and buy this NOW. Think, office, gym, casual and sports coat. It will work in all of these settings.<br />
<br />
The longevity is good for a freshy; I get around 5 to 6 hours on clothing (maybe a little longer). Sillage and projection are good as well (not great but good).<br />
 <br />
My lady loves this scent. It will work with the opposite sex. This will be a constant in my collection. I hope this helps.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1067199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1067199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1066910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/932755">Cancerian1978</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-04">06/04/19 01:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a clean fresh soapy fragrance. You cant hate it. It smells good more for the causal events and gatherings where you want to smell nice but without taking the risk of being offensive to others. Good for clubs and gyms. I cant really understand all the bad reviews. Sure it is not a special mind blowing fragrance but it is something that the noses around you will like to smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1066910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1066910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1057600" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1057600" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mcnubins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1192562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mcnubins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1057600ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1057600" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192562">Mcnubins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-06">05/06/19 08:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think the hate it gets comes because its hard to put this scent into a specific box. Its versatile but its not very versatile. It smells good but it there are better scents that will serve a specific purpose better. Anyone can wear it, but it smells old on young people and young on old people. People absolutely will notice that you smell good but its not going to turn heads or start conversations. Its a fresh from the shower scent that you can pull off at anytime but its best kept for spring, early summer and early fall. I have a bottle in my travel bag for just that reason. Only real failing is that it is has no specific identity......it's so original, its generic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1057600"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1057600#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1047851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1047851" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zhiang0113"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1173932"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1173932.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zhiang0113" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Vanilla-Romance-96320.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96320.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Romance"title="Vanilla Romance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1047851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1047851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1173932">zhiang0113</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-04">04/04/19 09:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, dewy fragrance that gives you the fresh-out-of-the-shower vibes. Definitely not what I was expecting given the "Black" name!<br />
<br />
Pretty pleasant, great for warm days. Versatile scent, albeit nothing too groundbreaking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1047851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1047851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1037686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1037686" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leaving_Jupiter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1100037"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1100037.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leaving_Jupiter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-2318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme"title="Versace Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1037686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1037686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1100037">Leaving_Jupiter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-04">03/04/19 09:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For a couple years, this just quietly gathered dust in my collection. Honestly - I could't stand it. <br />
<br />
Two years ago I gave it another chance, and wow, something changed. It's since been my daily. Not sexy, or warm, it's fresh and clean, and pretty much a complete "All the Bases" fragrance for me. <br />
<br />
While it's not the best juice in my stash, for sure it's going in the luggage to take on a trip, or keep in the car. All season, day or night, work or play. Unobtrusive sillage, smells clean for girls, but won't bug the guys on a jobsite either.<br />
<br />
Give it a chance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1037686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1037686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1030469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1030469" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ray The Juiceman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160329"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1160329.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ray The Juiceman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salvatore-Ferragamo/Uomo-Salvatore-Ferragamo-39466.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39466.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uomo Salvatore Ferragamo"title="Uomo Salvatore Ferragamo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1030469ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1030469" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160329">Ray The Juiceman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-12">02/12/19 05:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got this as a gift.. so you know I had to hop on to see how people feel about it. I really wasn't expecting half the flak. I get green.. but I also get leather, fruits, and an aquatic accord that surprised me since its "Black". It reminds me of a darker less sharp Aqua Di Gio. Maybe ADG Ultimate Black. It has a greenness of Lanvin Oxygen, but way toned down. I'll also say this, it smells really good. Don't be fooled by the negative reviews. For the ladies it's sure fire. My girl said this beat out all the big guns at Macy's (JPG, Paco, Chanel, Prada etc).<br />
<br />
I wouldn't consider this a light fresh scent like some people have said. I would say it's an all year rounder, leaning fall/winter.. or a spring/summer evening/night fragrance. Clubbing or a dinner event this could be a great option. It's fairly heavy and sweet to my nose, with a little spice, but not spicey. Now as far as being generic.. I would say I have smelled this before. I can't say what, where or when exactly, but this is done much better than what it reminds me of. Longevity is good and projection is good, and I enjoy the clean/soapy dry down.<br />
<br />
The note pyramid looks empty to me. I get depth and sweetness, but I can't really separate the notes. I'd say it's blended really well, and I get a smooth but strong leather note at the opening to mid. It dies at the drydown. Definite crowd pleaser, and all the negativity seems to come from the fact it isn't groundbreaking or niche.. while all the love comes from how people find it "sexy". Age group is highschool and up.. may be too sweet/generic for more mature noses. Casual to semi formal, but I wouldn't wear it to work. Might be too heavy/cloying. Overall great juice.<br />
<br />
Edit: What GGB reminded me of is Nautica Rush Gold mixed with a bit of Kenneth Cole Black. Own gold.. and I'd rather have this black. KC is still good though. Just not as good as this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1030469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1030469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1012449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; You think by the dislikes it smells like a rotten egg. It last about 8-10 hours on my skin and projects really well. Been told this is every girls favorite scent on me. Must admit thought smelled it on a tester a couple months ago and thought it smelled horrible. But on skins WOW smells fresh, green and maybe a bit aquatic. I’d defiantly recommend this scent for all day and night all season.<br />

It smells like the spit you spit out from chewing tobacco mixed with rotten wood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="998532"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=998532#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent992947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Woody notes that give that masculine cara here with little touches of sweetness . Great compliment getter ( if you want to get compliments from milfs ) this is a blind buy . However not like the pour homme this is a little bit more for grown up guys 25+ if you are a teen and want to smell really masculine go for the Gucci guilty eau por homme.<br />
Uniqueness :10/10<br />
Longetivety:8/10<br />
Performance :8/10<br />
Compliments :7/10 milf girls .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="992947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=992947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent991110" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="954913"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=954913#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent949167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc949167" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ryanmmas26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.761961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ryanmmas26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-Le-Parfum-91693.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91693.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"title="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma949167ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd949167" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961">Ryanmmas26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-03">06/03/18 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gucci gully Black is a fragrance that years ago I really loved and enjoyed and frequently wore it to work and actually received a few compliments with it.<br />
<br />
This opens up very green,musky, and soapy and this stays linear but in the drydown the lavender and woods come out making this a more smooth,soapy and aromatic scent. After being more experienced with scents over the year I still do like this but don’t love it like I used to.<br />
<br />
Performance on this is rather good as it lasts 6-8 hours and projects very well for an hour and a half before only having decent projection after that. On my skin I have to careful of overspraying as this is nice but does have a muskiness that can be overbearing if over applied. So for me 2-3 sprays for work and 4-5 sprays max for wearing it going out.<br />
<br />
Overall rating — 7 out of 10 ! Very nice scent that I do enjoy but unfortunately at this stage in the game I do have scents I will pick over this and because of that I just can’t rate it higher. I’m still debating if I’m going to repurchase this after I finish the bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="949167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=949167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent930885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc930885" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Christycaxxx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1129345"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1129345.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Christycaxxx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Not-A-Perfume-10296.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10296.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Not A Perfume"title="Not A Perfume"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma930885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd930885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1129345">Christycaxxx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-04-08">04/08/18 22:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great masculine scent. The composition of the notes gives off green, floral scent with a spritz of woody notes that combines into a sexy masculine scent. More suited for cooler months and night time. I love this scent on my husband and this fragrance would definitely elevate a suit and tie outfit for sure. The longevity is not bad. Overall a great masculine scent that is not overpowering.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="930885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=930885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent929292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
