Not an "special even" worthy but signature/ everyday worthy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="916403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=916403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent891022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc891022" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="demonix"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1105132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1105132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="demonix" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Original-Santal-473.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.473.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Original Santal"title="Original Santal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma891022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd891022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1105132">demonix</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-17">12/17/17 13:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have 2013 batch bottle, use it time-to-time and it has no perfomance issues you all talkin' about. Great longevity  for about 8-10 hrs and strong projection for 3-4 hours. So I was surprised when read comment here after 4 years using this frag.<br />
The scent is pretty nice, but not my favorite, but fresh and clean, very versatile. I thought it is loud until this moment :/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="891022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=891022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent888990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc888990" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="masonjarjar1969"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1073523.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="masonjarjar1969" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Supreme-Cashmere-43529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Supreme Cashmere"title="Polo Supreme Cashmere"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma888990ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd888990" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073523">masonjarjar1969</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-11">12/11/17 06:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My girlfriend liked this one best out of about a dozen scents we sampled at the mall.  This includes your BDC, Valentino, TDH, Prada and YSL.  (She doesn't dig this whole sweet movement)  Is it all that deep?  No.  Super strong?  No.  But she loves it when she puts her head on my chest.  Yes, I prefer D&amp;G The One, but this works great when I want an easy, clean and sexy fougere.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="888990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=888990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent878758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc878758" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JF Dufour"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821266"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.821266.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JF Dufour" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Eau-de-Toilette-73440.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73440.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Eau de Toilette"title="Y Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma878758ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd878758" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821266">JF Dufour</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-09">11/09/17 08:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorite fragrances.<br />
It is clean, versatile, safe, manly and sexy.<br />
Gucci Black smells very good. It's not boring or a supermarket fragrance.<br />
The performance is average-good (like many fragrances).<br />
I love the dry down : green notes with a hint of patchouli.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="878758"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=878758#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent863548" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc863548" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="keith.dunstan.tong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014943"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1014943.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="keith.dunstan.tong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Body-Shop/Red-Musk-Oud-31568.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31568.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Musk Oud"title="Red Musk Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma863548ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd863548" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014943">keith.dunstan.tong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-22">09/22/17 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get very light green notes, as airy as a men's perfume might go. I do not get any fruity notes, but instead, some wafts of the ocean - I imagine standing in an open meadow; I cannot see the ocean, but I can hear it softly beyond. Lavender is hiding somewhere, but it is quite elusive, only showing occasionally. <br />
<br />
Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme is nothing extraordinary. It is pretty linear, with little evolution beyond what I smell from first sniff. Some might like it, but if you are looking for complexity and nuance, consider a different perfume.<br />
<br />
It certainly isn't a night perfume. It lacks strength and intrigue. Perhaps a day-time perfume, for work or the everyday. You will not wow anybody, but neither will you offend. It is for the safe and oddly conservative, which is totally acceptable.<br />
<br />
I get pretty weak sillage, almost skin-scent; longevity is moderate. I would not purchase as I am compelled by complexity, but I imagine enough people would like this.<br />
<br />
Scent: 4/10<br />
Sillage: 2/10<br />
Longevity: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="863548"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=863548#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent852294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc852294" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rahildogra1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1075247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1075247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rahildogra1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-31861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage"title="Sauvage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma852294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd852294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); I get many compliments by it ! This is something very nice by Gucci after Gucci intense oud !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="852294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=852294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent842101" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc842101" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blatnoi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blatnoi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma842101ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd842101" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073967">Blatnoi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-17">07/17/17 06:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first perfume I ever had. <br />
<br />
To me it is a night perfume. Something I wouldn't wear at Summer and late Autumn. It smells heavy and cold! <br />
<br />
I would wear this in October nicely dressed in a peacoat and ripped jeans. That is the perfect scenario for this scent.<br />
<br />
At Summer only at night. Preferably on a date and intimate moments.<br />
Not an everyday scent! You should wear it occasionally. <br />
<br />
Longevity is about 8 hours. At least to me it was. Sillage is great in the beginning then it decreases. I mean the first 10-20 minutes are very good. Fills the room then it calms down and people will only smell it near you.<br />
<br />
The bottle and the box are elegant looking. They even look good as a decoration on your shelves, <br />
<br />
Not very outstanding, nor a classic, however you can't go wrong with this one. If you are not a fragrance collector or a fan, but you like the smell you should definitely buy it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="842101"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=842101#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent836487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc836487" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ThatMakesScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/204461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.204461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ThatMakesScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Black-Gold-43335.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43335.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Gold"title="Black Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma836487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd836487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/204461">ThatMakesScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-28">06/28/17 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with TonyAKAM :<br />
<br />
 Black is a different spin on Gucci Homme which I liked but would not buy due to performance issues.<br />
<br />
 Still trying out Black as far as performance goes. If it passes my test I would seriously consider purchasing this.<br />
<br />
Groundbreaking ? NO but a very good mainstream scent that I could easily pass off as luxurious if worn the proper way. I don't need labels ! I can rock my own style just give me something to work with !<br />
<br />
Update:<br />
<br />
 Wound up buying it. Put 8 sprays on and less than an hour later a girl couldnt smell it on me. She buried her nose on my shirt and neck.<br />
<br />
I will never buy Gucci again. Ripped off for $90.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="836487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=836487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent834824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc834824" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thusharajayawardana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1017618"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1017618.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thusharajayawardana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hollister/Hollister-Wave-For-Him-38891.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38891.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hollister Wave For Him"title="Hollister Wave For Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma834824ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd834824" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1017618">thusharajayawardana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-22">06/22/17 22:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't like this. One of the most awful smelling perfumes to me among thousands of pleasant ones which are available. I wont recommend this to any one who knows the value of money which could be used for something useful than this flop. <br />
overall 3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="834824"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=834824#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent834302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc834302" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonyAKAMrClean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1014646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonyAKAMrClean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma834302ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd834302" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014646">TonyAKAMrClean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-21">06/21/17 08:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All the dislike! So, why are sales so high?? <br />
<br />
Everyone here seems to hate the Gucci Guilty line, but the general population loves it. Gucci Guilty Black is an uber-masculine spin on the original Gucci Guilty. Sometimes, that's all you want is something that smells clean, masculine, and pleasant to the masses.<br />
<br />
Gucci Guilty Eau is still my favorite flanker from the Guilty line. It's an improved Gucci Guilty in every way, with even better performance in spite of the name 'Eau'. Eau competes with the original Gucci Guilty, as well as lighter, long-lasting aquatics, like Versace Pour Homme and Acqua Di Gio. Black, on the other hand, competes with scents like Bvlgari Man Extreme. UBER masculine is the only way I can describe it.<br />
<br />
While this Black flanker isn't my favorite (and probably won't be most peoples' favorite) it's not THAT bad guys. This is one that makes a decent dumb reach for days when you want something masculine and you just don't care for complexity.<br />
<br />
Also, your girlfriend (who isn't into fragrances) probably loves this one, so take that as you will. :)<br />
<br />
TLDR: This is the Coty Preferred Stock of our time...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="834302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=834302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent834105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc834105" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="foreignshores"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/621579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.621579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="foreignshores" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Joop/Nightflight-1721.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1721.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nightflight"title="Nightflight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma834105ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd834105" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/621579">foreignshores</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-20">06/20/17 15:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'll start by saying that I'm a Guilty fan. These fragrances were an acquired taste for sure, but I think they're all pretty wonderful. For me, this one bears very little resemblance to the rest of the Guilty line. Where the others feature that distinct fruity lemon/orange/patchouli accord, Black offers up a lush lavender/coriander(cilantro) combo instead. It's refreshing and bright, almost 'sporty'. The patchouli and cedar do emerge in the drydown, but to a lesser extent than in the original Guilty, Intense, and Eau. It's probably the safest blind buy out of the bunch, but it's still so readily available in department stores and shops like Sephora and Ulta, that there's no reason to buy before you try. It may not be groundbreaking or controversial, but it is undeniably high-quality and effortlessly enjoyable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="834105"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=834105#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent830419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells like high school cologne. I will update later. Has a mild aquatic note which I dont like</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="830419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=830419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent811919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/845924">joenick68</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-04-12">04/12/17 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I decided to get this Flanker of GG after reading some of the reviews here, although I see is a lot of dislikes on top, but I have the GG Stud flanker and for what I know is like the regular GG but in a different bottle, and this "Black" version seems to be a deeper version with more character.<br />
I am wearing today for the first time, and I had a couple of good compliments but at this point is has become very close to my skin after 6 hrs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="811919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=811919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent802923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc802923" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WmNoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053495"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WmNoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Oud-Palao-Eau-de-Parfum-31738.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31738.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Palao Eau de Parfum"title="Oud Palao Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma802923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd802923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053495">WmNoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-03-16">03/16/17 18:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely fell in love with this scent from the cap at the fragrance store and so it arrived recently with a few selections. I have read alot of negative reviews about longevity and I was hoping that it might boil down to skin type or ph or that perhaps people were wrong but they were not.. I am very disappointed about the longevity. I don't think you can overspray, (YES YOU CAN EW) the scent is really nice.. its very sweet but balanced - if you like to lean that way then maybe worth it.. <br />
<br />
I love the scent enough that I will probably use it before bed, but would not find it to be dependable for a long night out nor something I would take with me on vacation. If I do wear it out I will treat it like a bodyspray. Its short life on the skin deems this to be more suitable for something like a short casual date or for when I only have one appointment that day and i'm in a hurry to spray something on that won't make me see too formal. I can imagine that anyone would dislike the scent. It's impressive when its there...<br />
<br />
 I may try to over kill on this one just to see if I can make it last.  I had plans for this fragrance but now I will need to improvise.. All said, I am glad to have it on the shelf but I will be shopping for another Gucci. I still have not smelled the Original Gucci Guilty so maybe thats where I will land.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="802923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=802923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent780292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc780292" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="afluffyunicorn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1023501"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1023501.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="afluffyunicorn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma780292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd780292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);  <br />
Scent:8<br />
Projection:6<br />
Longevity:6<br />
<br />
Verdict, it's a great summer scent could be worn in winter if it lasted longer but nothing to special but if you find it cheap go for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="780292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=780292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent771797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc771797" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ItsOneOf5SensesGetOverIt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1036208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ItsOneOf5SensesGetOverIt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma771797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd771797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1036208">ItsOneOf5SensesGetOverIt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-12-17">12/17/16 18:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Deviated septums and incessant "douchebaggery" run rampant when rating....errr..berating a fragrance. More of the same with the reviews of Gucci Guilty Black. You don't need to be a "pinky up" reviewer or a high school sophomore just looking for something to wear to the homecoming dance to notice that this fragrance gets the job done. "It's been done before" you mean having women of all ages ask you what you're wearing because they love it? You're right. There was TV show called Happy Days and a character named Arthur Fonzarelli portrayed the role of a man wearing Gucci Guilty Black. "Soapy"? I'm sorry you're an enemy of clean. The thing is you CAN wear this day/night/Winter/Summer because it smells like a good time. Not for you of course, but rather for whoever is going to be smelling your neck chest and clothes. For those reasons this fragrance nailed it. For the other "expert" opinions...I'm sorry they didn't serve your half caf no whip soy double shot in an enema right before you hit the submit button to this review.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="771797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=771797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent767211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc767211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="msajoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/999719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.999719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="msajoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma767211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd767211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/999719">msajoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-12-04">12/04/16 08:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i get striking similarity between this and burberry brit rhythm that i also own...less powdery but the green and floral notes are alike.both are weak in performance department</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Thanks</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="763610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=763610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent754963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1024890">avaloncm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-10-24">10/24/16 07:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked the samples of Gucci Guilty and it is a possibility, but I wanted to see what I thought about the Black and Intense.  <br />
<br />
This one is very strong and catching whiffs constantly.  Only problem is it is just not a pleasing smell for me.  Not really any black here, but a whole lot of green.  <br />
<br />
Just not my style, but if you like green scents, give it a whirl.  Seems to be a quality fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="754963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=754963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent752737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Tried more than 80 different scents, this is easily in the top 10, makes me wonder if this rating system is rigged or this has been reformulated recently for the better cos newer reviews seems to be in its favor.<br />
<br />
Better than the original guilty, which i found the mid too sweet, this black has this floral mid that blends well with the original guilty, balancing it out better</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
I got this a while ago and the bottle is almost finished by now, the only reason it not finished is because i forgot it at my parents home .. i think i'll get a new one later..<br />
<br />
This is a very nice somewhat masculine sexy fragrance that is subtle and inoffensive.. i think its versatile and you can wear it all year long <br />
<br />
I have around 70 perfumes and this is one of my favourites <br />
<br />
only problem is the longevity and projection is average which is kind of expected from this type of perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="750375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=750375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent734405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Slightly buzzed, I sprayed both sides of my neck and both wrists then walked out. Instantly regretted it. Strong, sweet and soapy. Ugh. Smelled like an Axe body spray. Never again. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1008069">Bottledbull</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-08-11">08/11/16 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very uplifting fruity green scent to my nose that seems to project fairly well and last a few hours of acceptable performance, I don't count a fragrance's lastability as a skin scent ..to me it's as good as gone and never going to achieve anything as a skin scent. It reminds me of lacoste white a lot..very safe as a first date scent and will have the lady believe you are a fresh clean person. Great for any season and a safe blind buy, not to be confused with anything ground breaking but like others have said, in a complicated world its simplicity is superb...job done!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="731674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=731674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent703166" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc703166" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rerthegreat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/386099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rerthegreat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Intuition-for-Men-533.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.533.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intuition for Men"title="Intuition for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma703166ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd703166" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/386099">rerthegreat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-05-06">05/06/16 20:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gucci guilty green would've been better. Nothing "black" about this whatsoever, but green, oh so green. They've muted that creamaicle citrus vibe in guilty and intense and instead turned this into a spicy, woody aromatic. What a fantastic spring and fall scent, longevity is hit or miss. I've put this on and no one smelled me then other times an entire room was asking what I was wearing, go figure.<br />
Lots of compliments for a straightforward fragrance, kind of like a contemporary version of Brut. The way it smells on clothing is fantastic, and can be worn casual but I enjoy it moreso for formal or dress up occadions. it's  agood alternative to the stronger, more potent options like a Chanel anteaus or and oud fragrance, again especially in the fall or spring.<br />
I'm in a  vast minority but I really enjoy this,  guilty intense, made to measure, Gucci by Gucci and even Gucci sport. I recommend you give this a try with an open mind (all of the Gucci's I listed for that matter) because these can be had cheap on fragrance.net or other online discounters. Guilty black: woodsy green, aromatic not moody and dense, enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="703166"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=703166#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent699961" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc699961" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FlossmoorRay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/860290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.860290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FlossmoorRay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Eau-Extreme-14669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"title="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma699961ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd699961" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/860290">FlossmoorRay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-04-26">04/26/16 07:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In an age where colognes live and die by a handful of youtube reviewers and niche snobs, this line has been the scapegoat to unwarranted negativity. I understand that this isn't a daring scent. Sometimes I'm not in the mood to smell like some off the wall note that gets positive attention of a small(VERY SMALL) percentage of male fragrance-heads and negative feedback from the rest of the world (animals included). Sometimes I like to hear "wow, you smell nice" or "you smell great, what is that?", and thats when I reach for Gucci Guilty. Do I have other colognes that are "artistic" or "less synthetic"?..yes! Do I have other colognes that I enjoy better than this??? yes! I understand that I don't live in a bubble...hence the reason I own fragrances that are pleasing not only me, but to the general population. This is one of those fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="699961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=699961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent666534" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc628578" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JeffreyHan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/823368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.823368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JeffreyHan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Renaissance-12126.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12126.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Renaissance"title="XJ 1861 Renaissance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma628578ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd628578" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/823368">JeffreyHan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-09-09">09/09/15 19:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First, i do agree with all you guys that said that this is just a boring, generic fragrance..<br />
i mean, true, it's not ground breaking, already done by some others company before, and really not challenging..<br />
all are true.. but..<br />
on the other hand, i do have to agree with some that says that it smells good and refreshing..<br />
when i use this, i get more compliments than other of my more expensive and so called high quality perfume..<br />
<br />
i mean, ok sometimes i use what makes me comfortable, like some daring scents, complex, etc..<br />
but on some point, i also want to use something that will please the people around me..<br />
and mostly they are not a perfume collector as i do, so their nose is not like my nose that can appreciate the complexity in perfumes (i mean not always).. mostly they just like to smell some pleasing smell and the "generic" like this Gucci GBPH..<br />
<br />
I guess that every single individual has their preferences and their own taste.. and it's not necessary always a bad thing..<br />
<br />
don't judge and slam people that like a certain fragrance even if you feel that fragrance is sucks..<br />
you can express your feeling of disliking the fragrance in your review, but please keep it to your self and don't insult others..<br />
<br />
so, please respect and accept others preferences.. people come here to see reviews from every people, not just the one with huge collector and expert nose..<br />
<br />
thanks</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="628578"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=628578#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="17322" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent699961" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc699961" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FlossmoorRay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/860290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.860290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FlossmoorRay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Eau-Extreme-14669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"title="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma699961ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd699961" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/860290">FlossmoorRay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-04-26">04/26/16 07:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In an age where colognes live and die by a handful of youtube reviewers and niche snobs, this line has been the scapegoat to unwarranted negativity. I understand that this isn't a daring scent. Sometimes I'm not in the mood to smell like some off the wall note that gets positive attention of a small(VERY SMALL) percentage of male fragrance-heads and negative feedback from the rest of the world (animals included). Sometimes I like to hear "wow, you smell nice" or "you smell great, what is that?", and thats when I reach for Gucci Guilty. Do I have other colognes that are "artistic" or "less synthetic"?..yes! Do I have other colognes that I enjoy better than this??? yes! I understand that I don't live in a bubble...hence the reason I own fragrances that are pleasing not only me, but to the general population. This is one of those fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="699961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=699961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent377648" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc377648" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dreamframer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/270017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dreamframer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma377648ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd377648" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); Very masculine and fresh. I don't get why so many people dislike it...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="377648"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=377648#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent393957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc393957" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="em.caroline.9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/451590"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.451590.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="em.caroline.9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olivine-Atelier/Amongst-the-Waves-32319.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32319.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amongst the Waves"title="Amongst the Waves"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma393957ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd393957" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/451590">em.caroline.9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-08-08">08/08/13 00:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>not sure what hits the noses of other reviewers to make them hate such a pleasant fragrance... to each their own i suppose, theres plenty of scents i hate that others adore.<br />
<br />
i get a clean, green, deep imprint from it that invokes thoughts of a forest after rain. cliche'd but still enjoyable. <br />
<br />
that being said, it smells amazing on a man and makes me want to jump the bones of whoever is wearing it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="393957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=393957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1362858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This stuff smells fantastically fresh and mass appealing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="1362858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=1362858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2054135" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2054135" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JeremyNurse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1756702.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JeremyNurse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2054135ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2054135" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756702">JeremyNurse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-06">02/06/24 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fragrance snobs are gonna hate on this one. But the ladies frickin love it! It's bright, fresh, clean smelling. Is it a mind blowing niche fragrance? Nope. But does it smell good? yes. Will this get you loads of unsolicited compliments from the ladies especially say college age to mid 30s? Absolutely! If you are trying to impress a fragrance snob this won't do it. Go buy something from Creed, LV or initio for that. But if you want a grab and go fragrance that will get you compliments and the digits of that fine honey at the gym, coffee barista, nurse or random babe at the store? If that's what you want go for it! You can find it for a good price on discounters and hey, it just works.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="2054135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=2054135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="17322" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24461">antonpan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-01-05">01/05/13 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this one a few days ago. Some can't imagine there is something worse than Guilty. But there is! Gucci Guilty Black. It is Guilty but less citrusy, less sparkling and more soapy at the same time with lower sillage and longevity. Personally I do like Guilty, but Guilty Black is the most synthetic mess I've ever smelled.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="321874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=321874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent473662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
