padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc734405" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vegas Pauli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/783079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.783079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vegas Pauli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Terry-de-Gunzburg/Ombre-Mercure-Extreme-31889.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31889.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombre Mercure Extreme"title="Ombre Mercure Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma734405ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd734405" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/783079">Vegas Pauli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-08-20">08/20/16 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was recently at a upscale nightclub and the bathroom attendant had this as an option. Slightly buzzed, I sprayed both sides of my neck and both wrists then walked out. Instantly regretted it. Strong, sweet and soapy. Ugh. Smelled like an Axe body spray. Never again. Definite pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="734405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=734405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent973014" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc973014" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rocketteli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158797"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1158797.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rocketteli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tommy-Bahama/Maritime-for-Him-42300.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42300.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Maritime for Him"title="Maritime for Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma973014ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd973014" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158797">rocketteli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-18">08/18/18 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has one of the craziest openings and gets you excited to wear it for the first 15 minutes. Then the dry down gives you a huge tease and it turns right into a skin scent...sillage and projection are terrible. I really want to like this scent but it just doesnt perform.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="17322"comment_id="973014"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Black-Pour-Homme-17322.html?ccid=973014#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="17322" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">23.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>

    //including script with vue like mfga-app.js
    let langVars = {
        now_i_wear: "Currently I am wearing",
        confirm_delete: "Do you really want to delete your comment?",
        submit: "Submit",
        edit: "Edit",

    };

    
    

    let PerfumeSearchLangVar = {
        lang: "EN",

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
